channel.title: Zyrith RSPS - Where Unique Becomes Reality
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://www.zyrith.com]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://www.zyrith.com/play.html]Webclient[/URL] | [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/84386870/client.jar]Client Download[/URL]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/logo.png[/img]
Zyrith RSPS is a new server but myself have alot of experience of managing a server and I am fairly good at programming. The server can handle a good amount of players without any lag if any lag is found we always make sure we find the issue and try to fix it ASAP. We're also a server which tries its best to get the server working without any bugs. The combat is heavily modified and improved and we're hoping for PKers & Hybrids to come on our server to try it out so we can have feedback on the server's combat and fix it to make it suitable for all players. We also have alot of skills working which are rapidly being redone or improved. We also have a couple of minigames and more shall be added. We try our best to keep the server stable & all the players happy.
Working EP System New hitmarks with icons FullScreen, X10 hits toggle, F keys & etc. Working clan Wars (New clan chat to be added soon!) Quick Prayers & Curses Most skills working, All going to be redone one (Some have already been redone!) Lots of bosses like Barrelchest and KBD and more! (Lots more to be added in time!) Pest Control, Fight Pits, Barrows, Duel Arena, FunPK (More comin soon!) Flawless switching Working Hand Cannon with special Working XP counter Near perfect NPC & Player clipping New autocasting Fairly good modified combat system Can hold alot of players with lagging! And many other features which you'll notice when you login server, wasting time reading this won't help. ;)
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/skillmontage2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/qp1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/qp2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/curses.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/autocast1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/autocast2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.zyrith.com/zyrithadv/fs.png[/img]
[B]NOTE: You may face some minor lag. This will be fixed tomorrow![/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Zyrith RSPS - Where Unique Becomes Reality
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:8, topic:518591”][quote author=RS PS link=topic=636856.msg4293869#msg4293869 date=1367862888]

what’s so unique?

New content is coming soon. But look at the features I listed. Most servers don’t have some of them.
[/quote]

Working clan Wars (New clan chat to be added soon!)

That is literally the only special feature I see and even that isn’t really considered “unique”…you can take a leeched castle wars tutorial and deisgn clan wars easily from that.

“just saying”

Also…

Unique - 1. Being the only one of its kind: the unique existing example of Donne’s handwriting.

So really you can’t call Castle wars “unique” content cause that was originally made in RS. See where I am coming from now?

either way good luck![/quote]

Didn’t use castle wars.

But Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Zyrith RSPS - Where Unique Becomes Reality

item.title: Zyrith RSPS - Where Unique Becomes Reality

item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:7, topic:518591”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=636856.msg4293855#msg4293855 date=1367861885]
what’s so unique?
[/quote]

New content is coming soon. But look at the features I listed. Most servers don’t have some of them.[/quote]

Working clan Wars (New clan chat to be added soon!)

That is literally the only special feature I see and even that isn’t really considered “unique”…you can take a leeched castle wars tutorial and deisgn clan wars easily from that.

“just saying”

Also…

Unique - 1. Being the only one of its kind: the unique existing example of Donne’s handwriting.

So really you can’t call Castle wars “unique” content cause that was originally made in RS. See where I am coming from now?

either way good luck!

Read full topic

@RS_PS wrote:

[CENTER]Forums | Webclient | Client Download

Zyrith RSPS is a new server but myself have alot of experience of managing a server and I am fairly good at programming. The server can handle a good amount of players without any lag if any lag is found we always make sure we find the issue and try to fix it ASAP. We’re also a server which tries its best to get the server working without any bugs. We also have alot of skills working which are rapidly being redone or improved. We also have a couple of minigames and more shall be added.
